name: Smash Cube: Hit Click Hero 3D
description:
Take a cube journey through a cube tunnel!

This experience requires focus and concentration on fast craft cubes.
+ You must break the cube objects that stand in your way.
+ Smash your way through a cube tunnel, smashing obstacles!!!
+ Infinity cube tunnel and good cube graphics style with visual effects!

Play in Smash Cube: Hit Click Hero 3D (full version) now and check own speed of reaction!
